statements: SELECT * FROM social_media_sentiment;
SELECT id, sentiment_score FROM social_media_sentiment WHERE politician_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT * FROM social_media_sentiment WHERE sentiment_score > 0.5;
SELECT politician_id, AVG(sentiment_score) as avg_score FROM social_media_sentiment GROUP BY politician_id;
SELECT * FROM social_media_sentiment ORDER BY sentiment_score DESC;
SELECT id, sentiment_text FROM social_media_sentiment WHERE politician_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT politician_id, AVG(sentiment_score) AS avg_sentiment FROM social_media_sentiment GROUP BY politician_id;
SELECT sentiment_text, COUNT(*) AS num_posts FROM social_media_sentiment GROUP BY sentiment_text HAVING COUNT(*) > 1;
SELECT * FROM social_media_sentiment ORDER BY sentiment_score DESC, post_id ASC;
SELECT politician_id, MAX(sentiment_score) AS max_score FROM social_media_sentiment WHERE sentiment_text LIKE '%positive%' GROUP BY politician_id;
SELECT * FROM politicians;
SELECT name, party, followers_count FROM politicians WHERE party = 'Republican';
SELECT id, name, sentiment_score FROM politicians ORDER BY sentiment_score DESC;
SELECT * FROM tweets WHERE sentiment = 'positive';
SELECT author_id, text, posted_at FROM tweets ORDER BY posted_at DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT * FROM politicians WHERE party='Democratic' ORDER BY followers_count DESC;
SELECT name, party, followers_count FROM politicians WHERE followers_count > 1000;
SELECT name, party, sentiment_score FROM politicians WHERE party='Republican' AND sentiment_score > 0.5;
SELECT name, followers_count, sentiment_score FROM politicians WHERE party='Independent' ORDER BY sentiment_score DESC;
SELECT tweet_id, text, posted_at FROM tweets WHERE sentiment='positive' ORDER BY posted_at DESC;
SELECT * FROM politicians;
SELECT name, party FROM politicians WHERE party='Democratic';
SELECT name, number_of_followers FROM politicians WHERE number_of_followers > 10000;
SELECT post_id, content, post_date FROM posts ORDER BY post_date DESC;
SELECT post_id, reaction_type FROM reactions WHERE reaction_type='Like';
SELECT * FROM politicians WHERE party = 'Republican' ORDER BY name DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT name, party, number_of_followers FROM politicians JOIN posts ON politicians.id = posts.politician_id WHERE post_date >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY number_of_followers DESC;

SELECT politicians.name, COUNT(reactions.reaction_id) AS total_reactions FROM politicians LEFT JOIN posts ON politicians.id = posts.politician_id LEFT JOIN reactions ON posts.post_id = reactions.post_id GROUP BY politicians.name ORDER BY total_reactions DESC;
SELECT * FROM posts WHERE content LIKE '%election%' AND post_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31' ORDER BY post_date ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT reactions.reaction_type, COUNT(*) AS total_reactions FROM reactions GROUP BY reactions.reaction_type ORDER BY total_reactions DESC LIMIT 3;
SELECT * FROM politicians;
SELECT name, party FROM politicians WHERE party='Democratic';
SELECT post_text, post_date FROM posts ORDER BY post_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM reactions WHERE reaction_type='like';
SELECT username, location FROM users WHERE location='New York';
SELECT * FROM politicians WHERE party = 'Democratic';
SELECT name, party FROM politicians WHERE position = 'Senator' ORDER BY name DESC;
SELECT post_text, post_date FROM posts WHERE politician_id = 1 ORDER BY post_date ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT reactions.reaction_type, users.username FROM reactions JOIN users ON reactions.user_id = users.user_id WHERE reactions.post_id = 2;
SELECT * FROM politicians WHERE position IN ('Governor','Mayor') AND party = 'Republican';
SELECT * FROM politicians ORDER BY name DESC;
SELECT name, party FROM politicians WHERE followers_count > 10000;
SELECT content, created_at FROM tweets WHERE author_id = 1;
SELECT hashtag FROM hashtags WHERE hashtag_id = 3;
SELECT tweet_id, sentiment_score FROM sentiment_analysis ORDER BY analysis_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM politicians WHERE party = 'Democratic' ORDER BY followers_count DESC;
SELECT p.name, t.content, s.sentiment_score FROM politicians p JOIN tweets t ON p.id = t.author_id JOIN sentiment_analysis s ON t.tweet_id = s.tweet_id;
SELECT p.name, p.party, count(t.tweet_id) AS tweet_count FROM tweets t JOIN politicians p ON t.author_id = p.id GROUP BY p.name, p.party ORDER BY tweet_count DESC;
SELECT t.content, h.hashtag FROM tweets t JOIN hashtags h ON t.tweet_id = h.hashtag_id WHERE h.hashtag = '#politics' ORDER BY t.created_at DESC;
SELECT p.name AS politician_name, m.mentioned_user_id AS mentioned_user FROM politicians p JOIN mentions m ON p.id = m.mentioned_user_id;
